parameters.command: =mkdir -p /home/node/.n8n/dlq && echo '{{ JSON.stringify({ timestamp: $now.toISO(), error: { message: String($json.error?.message || $json.message || "Unknown error").replace(/'/g, ""), node: $json.error?.node?.name || "Unknown" }, recovery_attempts: 0 }) }}' > /home/node/.n8n/dlq/failed-{{ $now.format('yyyyMMdd-HHmmss') }}.json && echo 'DLQ saved'

nodes.name: Filter Event Type
nodes.notes: CRITICAL: Only process checkout.session.completed events. Ignore payment_intent.succeeded to prevent double bookings.

parameters.filterString: ={{ 'customer_email=eq.' + encodeURIComponent($('Extract Booking Data').first().json.customer_email) + '&start_time=eq.' + encodeURIComponent($('Extract Booking Data').first().json.start_time) + '&status=eq.pending' }}
